name: Scale the Skull Tower
description:
Can you climb the tower and defeat the evil necromancer? Jump from ledge to ledge and throw your sword into walls to make MORE LEDGES! Also, bounce on some slimes. Might be fun, right?

This game was made in 10 days for the VimJam2 game jam. The theme was "On the Edge" and the requirement was "Boss"! How did I do?

- Cortok

The game might take a few moments to load. Please be patient, but if it refuses to load, there is also a downloadable version below.
